Add an URL

Source: R/addURL.R
addURL.Rd

Add and URL in HTML or Markdown format.

addURL(url, text = NULL, extra = NULL, markdown = FALSE)

Arguments

url

An URL.
text

A character string to be searched within.
extra

Extra A connection object or a character string that stand for a path, ignored if text is defined.
markdown

logical. If TRUE, hyperlinks marks of Markdown language are sought.

Examples

addURL('https://github.com/inSileco/letiRmisc', 'Github repo')
#> [1] "<a href='https://github.com/inSileco/letiRmisc'>Github repo</a>"
addURL('https://github.com/inSileco/letiRmisc', 'Github repo', markdown=TRUE)
#> [1] "[Github repo](https://github.com/inSileco/letiRmisc)"
